name: Photobound (demo)
description:
This is a demo for Photobound, a remake of a game of the same name that I helped make for Ludum Dare 31 (Which is available here: https://jellonator.itch.io/photobound-ld). This iteration of Photobound is created with Godot 3.2.1.

Photobound is a 2D puzzle platforming game where the screen boundaries are solid, and solving puzzles involves leveraging this mechanic. This demo currently has 5 levels with 10 collectibles total. The game will autosave your completion.

You play as Gelatina, an aspiring nature photographer, who is on a quest to photograph rare bird species.

Controls

  • Jump - Z
  • Pick Up/Drop - X
  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Restart - R
  • Pause - Escape

(Controls can be changed, and controllers are supported)
